Tucson agreed wtih Perceptor, and quickly drives right up to Rodimus holdin=
g his cab open.  Quickstride uses his strength to drag Rodimus up the ramp =
leading into his leader's trailer.  Straight Shot now tries to help get the=
 strands of silk off of Rodimus and finds them rather sticky to the touch.
=

" Ewwww, grosss.  Don't worry Rodimus, we'll try ta get these off."

She a=
ttempts to uncover the fallen Prime, as does Quickstride who is still tryin=
g to get Rodimus up into Tucson's trailer.

" No time ta get grossed out, w=
e gotta get him inta Tucson's cab ASAP!" 

Tucson remains stationary while =
firing off the blast cannons on his headlight ports.

" Hurry, we haven't g=
ot much time, just get him aboard so we can get out of here."

Quickstride =
snorts, after getting silk in his nose.

"Yes sir, we're trying our best, h=
e's kinda heavy."

With Straight Shot's help, Quickstride attempts to get r=
odimus fully loaded onto Tucson's trailer.  A loud hiss comes from Tucson's=
 hydraulics as he prepares to put himself in drive once again.
